title: SHOW PRIVILEGES | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Lists the privileges granted to an application.
Specifies the name of the application.
Specifies the privileges granted to an application.
The name of the privilege as specified in the manifest file.

A description of the privilege, which is specified in the manifest file. For details,
refer to Access control privileges.
Specifies if the consumer has granted the privilege.

Specifies if the user running the command has an
activated role that can grant this
privilege
